form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Moran (for himself and Mr. Gallego) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To increase the apportionment of formula grants for small transit intensive cities.

subsection.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Communities Transit Improvement Act.

section.header: Increase percentage of formula for small transit intensive cities
section.text: Section 5336(h)(3) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by striking 3 percent and inserting 5 percent.
